description: Newcomer Jolene, "The Blond Giant" weighs in at 145lb and is 5'8". Her opponent the Ninja weighs in at 109lb and is four inches shorter. Even when giving up four inches and almost 30lbs the Ninja shows why she is lifetime 12-2 and why she is Featherweight Champ.
title: The Ninja vs. The Blond Giant
